verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your priesthood. <S%H3550><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> thy brethren <S%H251><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of thy father, <S%H1><s%> bring <S%H7126><s%> thou with <S%H854><s%> thee, that they may be joined <S%H3867><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> thee, and minister <S%H8334><s%> unto thee: but thou <S%H859><s%> and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee shall minister before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness. <S%H5715><s%>

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> thy charge, <S%H4931><s%> and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the tabernacle: <S%H168><s%> only <S%H389><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H413><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> that neither <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1571><s%> they, <S%H1992><s%> nor ye <S%H859><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

And they shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> thee, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle: <S%H168><s%> and a stranger <S%H2114><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> come nigh <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you.

And ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> that there be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And I, <S%H589><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> to you they are given <S%H5414><s%> as a gift <S%H4979><s%> for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

Therefore thou <S%H859><s%> and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> your priest's office <S%H3550><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and within <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> the veil; <S%H6532><s%> and ye shall serve: <S%H5647><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> your priest's office <S%H3550><s%> unto you as a service <S%H5656><s%> of gift: <S%H4979><s%> and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that cometh nigh <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H589><s%> also have given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of mine heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> unto thee have I given <S%H5414><s%> them by reason of the anointing, <S%H4888><s%> and to thy sons, <S%H1121><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine of the most holy things, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> reserved from <S%H4480><s%> the fire: <S%H784><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> oblation <S%H7133><s%> of theirs, every <S%H3605><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of theirs, and every <S%H3605><s%> sin offering <S%H2403><s%> of theirs, and every <S%H3605><s%> trespass offering <S%H817><s%> of theirs, which <S%H834><s%> they shall render <S%H7725><s%> unto me, shall be most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> for thee and for thy sons. <S%H1121><s%>

In the most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> place shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> it; every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it: it shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> unto thee.

And this <S%H2088><s%> is thine; the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of their gift, <S%H4976><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the wave offerings <S%H8573><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto thee, and to thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and to thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in thy house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it.

All <S%H3605><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> of the oil, <S%H3323><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> of the wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of the wheat, <S%H1715><s%> the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of them which <S%H834><s%> they shall offer <S%H5414><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> them have I given <S%H5414><s%> thee.

And whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> is first ripe <S%H1061><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they shall bring <S%H935><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine; every one <S%H3605><s%> that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in thine house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it.
Every thing <S%H3605><s%> devoted <S%H2764><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine.

Every thing <S%H3605><s%> that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the matrix <S%H7358><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> whether it be of men <S%H120><s%> or beasts, <S%H929><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine: nevertheless <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shalt thou surely redeem, <S%H6299><s%> <S%H6299><s%> and the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> shalt thou redeem. <S%H6299><s%>

And those that are to be redeemed <S%H6299><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou redeem, <S%H6299><s%> according to thine estimation, <S%H6187><s%> for the money <S%H3701><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs. <S%H1626><s%>

But <S%H389><s%> the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a cow, <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a goat, <S%H5795><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> redeem; <S%H6299><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are holy: <S%H6944><s%> thou shalt sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and shalt burn <S%H6999><s%> their fat <S%H2459><s%> for an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of them shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine, as the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and as the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> thine.

All <S%H3605><s%> the heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things, <S%H6944><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> offer <S%H7311><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> thee, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto thee and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Thou shalt have no inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou have <S%H1961><s%> any part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: I <S%H589><s%> am thy part <S%H2506><s%> and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tenth <S%H4643><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> for <S%H2500><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> serve, <S%H5647><s%> even <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> must the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> henceforth <S%H5750><s%> come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> lest they bear <S%H5375><s%> sin, <S%H2399><s%> and die. <S%H4191><s%>

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations, <S%H1755><s%> that among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they have <S%H5157><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they offer <S%H7311><s%> as a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to inherit: <S%H5159><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5157><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, When <S%H3588><s%> ye take <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tithes <S%H4643><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them for your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> then ye shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even a tenth <S%H4643><s%> part of <S%H4480><s%> the tithe. <S%H4643><s%>

And this your heave offering <S%H8641><s%> shall be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> unto you, as though it were the corn <S%H1715><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the threshingfloor, <S%H1637><s%> and as the fullness <S%H4395><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the winepress. <S%H3342><s%>

Thus <S%H3651><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall offer <S%H7311><s%> a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your tithes, <S%H4643><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye receive <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> thereof <S%H4480><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> heave offering <S%H8641><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

Out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your gifts <S%H4979><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof, even <S%H853><s%> the hallowed part <S%H4720><s%> thereof out of <S%H4480><s%> it.

Therefore thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, When ye have heaved <S%H7311><s%> <S%H853><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof from <S%H4480><s%> it, then it shall be counted <S%H2803><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the threshingfloor, <S%H1637><s%> and as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the winepress. <S%H3342><s%>

And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in every <S%H3605><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> and your households: <S%H1004><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is your reward <S%H7939><s%> for <S%H2500><s%> your service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And ye shall bear <S%H5375><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> by reason of <S%H5921><s%> it, when ye have heaved <S%H7311><s%> from it <S%H853><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it: neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye pollute <S%H2490><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> ye die. <S%H4191><s%>
